prompts: Create a majestic fire-type Pokemon with a fiery mane and a strong physique.
I want a legendary creature that embodies the spirit of fire with unique abilities.
Generate an imposing quadruped Pokemon that instills fear in its enemies.
Make a Pokemon that can control flames with magnificent orange and brown colors.
Imagine a powerful guardian Pokemon that roams the mountains and deserts.
Design a fierce fire-type Pokemon with ice-blue accents and a lion-like appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the strength and valor of fire in nature.
